post.summary: Get category full list or short list as your requirement.
post.description: By default this end-point will provide a short list of category with three column 'id', 'title', 'slug'). For full list you have to provide a body param with the key 'list_type' and value = full_list. Pass body param with the key 'slider_menu' and value = 'menu_view' to get all the categories for Slider-Menu.  Used in: index

401.description: Unauthorize Access, Invalid Token or Token has expired

post.summary: Get product list according to category ID.
post.description: By default this end-point will provide all records according to given category_id and outlet_id. Required parameter 'category_id' and 'outlet_id', optional parameters 'random', 'page_size;. Then you can get custom number of records per page by providing a body param with the key 'page_size'. Also get random records by 'random' = true.

post.description: This end-point will be used for registration new user. You have to provide body params with the keys of- 'username', 'password', 'password_confirmation', and 'email' (Optional). The 'username' must be a valid phone number and password length at least 6 digit. After registration, system will send an OTP to given username (phone), that you must verify in '/api/registration-otp-verify'.

401.description: Unauthenticated

post.description: This end-point will be used for verify Registration OTP.
